Texto: 
not available
trans-oral resection
• a 3 cm mass at the anterior margin of the foramen magnum
• mass is slightly hyperintense on t1 and t2 sequences
• mass enhances very markedly.

• there is marked compression of the brainstem at the medullary-cervical junction
craniovertebral junction meningioma
• chordoma
• metastatic lesion
• meningioma
• chondrosarcoma
59 y.o. woman with chronic headaches
